Question: This person left the Navy at age 22 on August 23, 1952, and became a Lieutenant, Junior Grade, in the U.S Naval Reserve.
Hints: This person's second and last spaceflight was as mission commander of the Apollo 11 moon landing, in July 1969.
The lunar crater this person, 31 mi (50 km) from the Apollo 11 landing site, and asteroid 6469 this person are named in his honor.
When **** made his proclamation, Voice of America was rebroadcast live via the BBC and many other stations worldwide.
